text: this is sad and I'm an Afghan refugee
living in Reykjavik Iceland this 20 year
old guy survived a very rough childhood
I say survived because some of his
friends and family members didn't when I
was in a young age
the Taliban take over the village and
they burn down my school and they beaten

with Bloods and everything and I have

by the Taliban
his brother was severely injured and all
that mixed with the tanking economy and
the looming threat of the Taliban taking
his life Syed was forced to leave home
at 14 they have come to my house and
they have they were searching for some
stuff in my house because my brothers
were in politics he walked across the

couldn't make it at a time so they
deported me back in Afghanistan so I
again left Afghanistan in 2016 he then
made his way to Turkey then Greece
Holland and now he lives here in Iceland
after seven months of being here I
granted asylum for four years now I'm
happy so I have my passport and my
documents in hand I can travel all
around the euro side life has been
reborn in this country he has found
happiness and friendship slowly slowly
I'm integrating into society it's been

he's a nice guy he currently has two

oh it's mine I can always count on him
